note.p: Birth: Oakley Park, Kings County, Ireland (15 February 1826)
Death: 30 Chepstow Crescent, Notting Hill Gate, London (05 July 1911)
Burial: Ashes buried in Dundrum, County Dublin, Ireland
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1848), MA (1852)

Career: First Assistant Astronomer, Parsonstown Observatory (1848-1852); Professor of Natural Philosophy, Galway (1852-1857); Secretary, Queen's University of Ireland (1857-1882); left Dublin for London (1893)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1911-1912 vol 86 pp xx-xxxv, plate, signed by J J
References: J G O'Hara, 'George Johnstone Stoney, FRS, and the Concept of the Electron' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 265-276, plate
